# Building dashboards with Shiny

## bslib

Modern UI toolkit for Shiny based on [Bootstrap](https://getbootstrap.com/):

-   Creation of delightful and customizable [Shiny dashboards](https://rstudio.github.io/bslib/articles/dashboards.html) with [cards](https://rstudio.github.io/bslib/articles/cards.html), [value boxes](https://rstudio.github.io/bslib/articles/value-boxes.html), [sidebars](https://rstudio.github.io/bslib/articles/sidebars.html), etc.

-   [Custom theming](https://rstudio.github.io/bslib/articles/theming.html)

-   Use of modern versions of Bootstrap and [Bootswatch](https://bootswatch.com/)

Learn more at [https://rstudio.github.io/bslib](https://rstudio.github.io/bslib/).
